text: infant or toddler Environmental interventions warm room calm atmosphere parental presence familiar toys Distraction techniques [NB1] non-nutritive sucking (eg dummy/pacifier) breastfeeding [NB3] parental eye contact, voice noise makers (eg rattles, shakers) bubble blowing puppet play music and singing storytelling cause and effect toys Physical interventions [NB2] sitting up if possible hugging patting stroking
